member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_DESC.NodeMask
member.summary: The node mask specifying the physical adapter on which the video processor will be used. For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set a bit to identify the node, i.e. the device's physical adapter, to which the command queue applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit may be set.
